item.content:encoded:
Price: $14.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:12:42 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Since our founding in 2009, we’ve aimed to make the highest-quality products while giving back to shelter and non-profit organizations.

As a B Corporation, making things better, for dogs and people, is the reason we’re excited to come to work each day.

Earth Rated Refill Rolls

Earth Rated Grooming Wipes

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 13.2 x 9.7 x 9.7 inches; 4 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ UNSCENTBIO270
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 25, 2014
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Earth Rated
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B00LAI9OM6

FOR ALL PUPS AND POOPS: Extra long, extra strong bags to accommodate any size poop. These bags are designed to fit our dispenser, or any standard sized dispenser like a glove.
MORE BAGS, MORE WAGS: 270 poop bags (18 rolls x 15 bags each) to keep all your dispensers (pockets, tote bags, drawers, and car glove compartment) full.
GIVING BACK SINCE 2009: Your purchase from Earth Rated helps support animal shelters, rescues & non-profit organizations. As a B Corporation, making things better, for dogs and people, is the reason we’re excited to come to work each day.
OFTEN IMITATED, NEVER POOP-LICATED: Official Earth Rated dispenser made to fit our rolls of 9″x13″ poop bags in both lavender scented and unscented. Perfect for small, medium and large dogs.

Previous page

  1. Why our poop bags?

    Ultra Thick and Durable

    Because you’re picking up poop, so we’re not taking any chances.

  2. Why our poop bags?

    100% Leak-proof

    Which means no chance of poop on your hands. (It’s the least we could do.)

  3. Why our poop bags?

    Choose your scent (or lack thereof)

    Choose Unscented for a classic catch-all, or pick Lavender-scented and conceal your dog’s biz.
